title: Trade Secrets
context: [CHAPTER 482B] TRADE SECRETS Section 482B-1 Short title 482B-2 Definitions 482B-3 Injunctive relief 482B-4 Damages 482B-5 Attorney&rsquo;s fees 482B-6 Preservation of secrecy 482B-7 Statute of limitations 482B-8 Effect on other law 482B-9 Severability Case Notes By alleging an induced breach of a confidentiality agreement or a non-disclosure agreement, plaintiff had also alleged that defendants improperly acquired trade secret information; those claims were sufficiently related to plaintiff&rsquo;s allegations of trade secret misappropriation to warrant preemption under this chapter; defendants&rsquo; motion to dismiss granted. 780 F. Supp. 2d 1061 (2011). Trade secrets may be subject to equitable division pursuant to ยง580-47, depending upon when the right to the trade secret vested. 99 H. 101, 53 P.3d 240.
